ArFunctorC< T > Class Template Reference

#include <ArFunctor.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class ArFunctorC< T >

Functor for a member function.

This is a class for member functions. This class contains the knowledge on how to call a member function on a particular instance of a class. This class should be instantiated by code that wishes to pass off a functor to another piece of code.

For an overall description of functors, see ArFunctor.

Examples:

directMotionExample.cpp, dpptuExample.cpp, functorExample.cpp, gpsRobotTaskExample.cpp, gripperExample.cpp, gyroExample.cpp, lineFinderExample.cpp, robotConnectionCallbacks.cpp, robotSyncTaskExample.cpp, sonyPTZDemo.cpp, triangleDriveToActionExample.cpp, and vcc4CameraExample.cpp.
